FuncDef: The display fips-mode algorithm self-check command displays whether the algorithms used by cryptographic modules of the device comply with FIPS. The display fips-mode algorithm self-check command displays whether the algorithms used by cryptographic modules of the device comply with FIPS.
CLIs: display fips-mode algorithm self-check [ all | slot <slotId> [ cpu <cpuId> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays algorithm self-check information about all slots and CPUs.
-
